name: CivCity
description:
It's a game I've made for the Ludum Dare Game Jam 38.
The theme was A Small World.

I didn't do it in 72 hours. Because, I have a job and a family life. So I just took all I had i. e. 8 hours.

That's it. Just enjoy my first Ludum Dare project ;-)
